mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_j WHERE user_id=#{user_id} AND password=#{password}
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, a.user_id, b.category, b.title, b.content, b.created_at, b.updated_at, b.report, b.read_count, b.like_count FROM user_j a LEFT OUTER JOIN communityboard b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE a.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (select t1.*, row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY id DESC) AS seqnum FROM CommunityBoard t1) t1 WHERE user_id=#{user_id} and category=0) t1 WHERE seqnum BETWEEN #{page.startRow} AND #{page.endRow}
SELECT count(*) as listCnt FROM communityboard WHERE user_id=#{user_id} and category=0
